name: Audio Messaging Solutions, LLC
overview:
Mitchell Keller founded Conquest Communications Inc. in 1986 to provide high quality business audio services. In January 2002, Aaron Kleinhandler, joined Keller as CEO and together they created Audio Messaging Solutions LLC. Since that time, AMS has successfully completed 10 acquisitions of other on hold messaging companies and effectively integrated their operations into our corporate infrastructure.

AMS features fully staffed customer service, creative writing, recording, sales, and administrative departments, serving more than 35,000 plus customer locations from offices in Tampa Bay, FL, Philadelphia, PA, and San Juan, Puerto Rico.

milestones.description: Audio Messaging Solutions announces merger with IOHI
milestones.source_description: Audio Messaging Solutions Merges with IOHI, Forming Powerhouse in Audio-Video Marketing Industry
